translation.en: [crowd chanting] Santi! Santi! Santi! Santi! Santi!
translation.ja: サンティ　サンティ…

translation.en: [announcer] Yo, Miami! On the first leg of his world tour,
translation.ja: ワールドツアー初日はここマイアミ

translation.en: make some noise, y'all! It's Santi!
translation.ja: 皆さん 大きな拍手でサンティをお迎えください

translation.en: ♪ Tú dices que eres lowkey Pero ese booty ♪ ♪ Exagerao ♪
translation.ja: “サンティ”

translation.en: Absolutely, so heavy.
translation.ja: マジで超最高だった

translation.en: -Honestly, the heaviest. -I couldn't have done it
translation.ja: マジで超最高だった 君ら２人のおかげさ

translation.en: -without my corillo! -[phone vibrates]
translation.ja: 君ら２人のおかげさ

translation.en: -Yo, Daddy Yankee! Dímelo, hermano. -[Daddy Yankee] Santi.
translation.ja: 〈ダディー･ヤンキー感想は？〉

translation.en: -You're a star. -[girls tittering]
translation.ja: お前はスターだ

translation.en: -Hey, I gotta call you right back. -Dale, papi.
translation.ja: 後で かけ直す

translation.en: Santi, we love you so much.
translation.ja: あなたの大ファンなの

translation.en: Let's all have sex, together.
translation.ja: みんなで一緒にエッチしない？

translation.en: Santi, you can't. It's time.
translation.ja: サンティ もう時間だ

translation.en: Time for what?
translation.ja: 時間って？

translation.en: You ladies can head back with me.
translation.ja: あなたたちは私と一緒に

translation.en: -It's time. Come on. -Ness!
translation.ja: もう時間だよ

translation.en: What? We can share!
translation.ja: ネス 俺も交ぜろ

translation.en: -We gotta go. We gotta go. Come on. -No. Come on, Santi, wake up.
translation.ja: もう行かないと間に合わない

translation.en: -Wake up. -[groaning]
translation.ja: 目を覚ませ

translation.en: -Wake up. It's time. -Bro, wake up.
translation.ja: 起きろ 寝てちゃダメ

translation.en: -You don't wanna miss this. -Oh, I had the craziest dream.
translation.ja: 寝てちゃダメ すごい夢を見た

translation.en: Tell me everything before we forget.
translation.ja: 内容を教えて

translation.en: -Why do you guys do this? -[Felix] Ness,
translation.ja: なぜ聞くわけ？ 僕はクリエーティブディレクター

translation.en: I'm this young man's creative director,
translation.ja: 僕はクリエーティブディレクター

translation.en: and dreams are a creative director's clay, if you will.
translation.ja: 夢を創造のヒントにしたい

translation.en: -Do you will? -What?
translation.ja: お分かり？ 何て？

translation.en: -Do you will? -Okay, Felix,
translation.ja: 分かった？ フィリックス それよりガソリンスタンドを探して

translation.en: as this young man's manager, shut the fuck up and find a gas station like I've asked you to do.
translation.ja: フィリックス それよりガソリンスタンドを探して

translation.en: -Yes, sorry. -Guys, we're so blessed.
translation.ja: 了解 最高だな

translation.en: I mean, we're moving to Miami. Like, this is it.
translation.ja: マイアミに引っ越せるなんて

translation.en: Oh, my God, not this again. I gotta get you there in under an hour,
translation.ja: １時間以内には家に到着したい

translation.en: to give us enough time to move into the apartment, to eat, and get at least eight hours of beauty sleep before the label meeting--
translation.ja: そうすれば８時間は眠れるし明日のレーベルとの面談に…

translation.en: -Shit! -[man] …with his viral hit,
translation.ja: ちょっと黙って

translation.en: -with over six million views and counting… -[screams] -…"Exagerao," by Fort Myers' own, Santi. -[cheering]
translation.ja: ネットで600万回再生されたサンティの「エクサヘラオ」

translation.en: -Let's go! -Hey, bro, you're on the radio!
translation.ja: ネットで600万回再生されたサンティの「エクサヘラオ」 ラジオで流れてる

translation.en: -["Exagerao" playing] -I'm starstruck.
translation.ja: もうスターだ

translation.en: Guys, this is it. This is destiny!
translation.ja: これが運命ってやつさ

translation.en: ♪ Frikitona, me lo puso de espaldas ♪
translation.ja: “マイアミ”

translation.en: ♪ No es el sol, pero quiero que salga Bandida ♪
translation.ja: “ようこそ”

translation.en: ♪ Tú de mí no te olvidas ♪
translation.ja: ネオン

translation.en: It feels so good to finally not be a tourist in Miami.
translation.ja: マイアミに住めるなんて最高だ

translation.en: -[Ness laughs] -Miami.
translation.ja: マイアミか

translation.en: Oh, this is gonna be great. -This is gonna be so great! -I--
translation.ja: これから楽しくなるねワクワクする

translation.en: Yo, we've been here five minutes, already seen your cousin Sebastian's ads.
translation.ja: あなたのいとこのセバスチャンの広告よ あなたのいとこのセバスチャンの広告よ “豊尻トラブルは法廷で”

translation.en: He must be killing it with all the fucked-up BBLs here.
translation.ja: お尻のトラブルで荒稼ぎね

translation.en: A botched BBL wouldn't be a dealbreaker for me. It's like getting a discount on bruised fruit. Still tastes the same.
translation.ja: お尻の形が悪くても果物と同じで味は変わらない

translation.en: [in Spanish] Should we take him out of the group?
translation.ja: 〈彼はクビに〉

translation.en: But he's the best at what he does.
translation.ja: 〈いい映像を撮る〉

translation.en: I know, I hate it.
translation.ja: 〈私の趣味と違う〉

translation.en: [in English] Don't be bullies, cabrones.
translation.ja: 僕をいじめるなよ

translation.en: -We're not bullying you. -I can tell by your tone.
translation.ja: いじめてない 口調で分かる

translation.en: Yo, did… Did Mia's assistant confirm for tomorrow?
translation.ja: ミアの助手に面談時間の確認を？

translation.en: Yeah. We're good. 11:30.
translation.ja: 明日の11時半

translation.en: Yes! And she knows that all three of us are coming?
translation.ja: 俺たち３人そろって来いと？

translation.en: Uh-huh.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: Just 'cause I don't have any experience, doesn't mean I don't know what I'm doing.
translation.ja: 私は素人だけどノウハウを持ってる

translation.en: That's what that means.
translation.ja: そのとおりだね

translation.en: -[phone beeps] -[Santi] What?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: "Thinking of the kids suffering in Africa and countries around the world."
translation.ja: “アフリカなどの国で苦しむ子供たちを支援する” “ハビエル･ルナ”

translation.en: "I do this for y'all."
translation.ja: “アフリカなどの国で苦しむ子供たちを支援する”

translation.en: You have alerts on for Javier Luna's Instagram?
translation.ja: ハビエルのＳＮＳの通知をオンに？

translation.en: You being jealous of Javier Luna, one of my favorites. Also, his origin story is very fascinating.
translation.ja: 嫉妬(しっと)するってことは競争心があるからいい傾向よ

translation.en: I'm not jealous of Javier. I'm just asking why does he have his alerts on?
translation.ja: 嫉妬なんかしてない 彼はレゲトン界のマシン･ガン･ケリーだ

translation.en: I don't get why people compare us.
translation.ja: 彼はレゲトン界のマシン･ガン･ケリーだ

translation.en: That guy is like a reggaeton Machine Gun Kelly.
translation.ja: 彼はレゲトン界のマシン･ガン･ケリーだ 自分で曲を作ってない

translation.en: He doesn't even write his own music.
translation.ja: 自分で曲を作ってない

translation.en: What's wrong with MGK?
translation.ja: ケリーはダメ？

translation.en: You at least have alerts on for my page, right?
translation.ja: 俺のＳＮＳの通知はオフか？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: How are you in charge of my social media page but you only have alerts on for Javier Luna and not me?
translation.ja: 君がＳＮＳ担当なのになぜ俺のはオフに？

translation.en: Why do I need to have alerts on? I post things. I'm the alert.
translation.ja: 僕が投稿してるからさ

translation.en: This is why I should be in charge of socials.
translation.ja: ＳＮＳは私に担当させて

translation.en: -You in charge of socials? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 友達が２人だけのくせに

translation.en: -Ness, you have two friends. -Yeah, so do you.
translation.ja: 友達が２人だけのくせに あなたもね

translation.en: Who do you want running your Instagram?
translation.ja: サンティ どっちが担当？

translation.en: Yo, Africa's not even a country.
translation.ja: アフリカは国じゃない

translation.en: It isn't, right?
translation.ja: だろ？

translation.en: -[Irma] There it is. This is it. -Ness.
translation.ja: 気に入ったかしら？

translation.en: [clears throat] Ness.
translation.ja: おい ネス

translation.en: [chuckling] This is not what was in the photos.
translation.ja: 写真と違うじゃないか

translation.en: Relax, I got this.
translation.ja: 私に任せて

translation.en: This is not what was in the photos.
translation.ja: 写真と違う

translation.en: I know, but the pictures are old, very old. I had it updated since.
translation.ja: それは かなり昔に撮ったものなのよ

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: Did anybody die in here? I'm definitely feeling someone's ancestors.
translation.ja: この部屋で誰か死んだ？気配を感じる

translation.en: It's not what we thought.
translation.ja: 思ってたのとは違うが家具もそろってる

translation.en: But this place is fine. It comes furnished, I mean…
translation.ja: 思ってたのとは違うが家具もそろってる ここでも十分だろ？

translation.en: It works.
translation.ja: ここでも十分だろ？

translation.en: Given this was a bait and switch, obviously, we're gonna need some sort of discount.
translation.ja: これは おとり広告だから値引きして

translation.en: There's gonna be an extra charge for the furniture.
translation.ja: 家具の追加料金がかかる

translation.en: That's the opposite of what I said.
translation.ja: 逆に値上げ？

translation.en: Keep negotiating. You're doing great.
translation.ja: 交渉術を見せてくれ

translation.en: Extra. It has to be extra, 'cause I have to cover the furniture rental, the lease.
translation.ja: 家具のレンタル料も払ってもらわないと

translation.en: I have to pay for the beds, the couch, the table, the spoons.
translation.ja: ベッドやテーブルにスプーンのね

translation.en: -Spoons? -[Santi] Look.
translation.ja: スプーン？

translation.en: Even with the extra, guys, I mean, this is fine. We're…
translation.ja: 追加料金がかかったとしても別に構わない

translation.en: We're in. It's a great deal.
translation.ja: 追加料金がかかったとしても別に構わない いい家だ　契約しよう

translation.en: Let's make it happen.
translation.ja: いい家だ　契約しよう

translation.en: -It's a deal. -Perfect.
translation.ja: 契約成立 どうも

translation.en: Eh, mmm, we'll take care of the paperwork. It's gonna be two days to process and then you are in.
translation.ja: 手続きに時間がかかるから入居できるのは２日後よ

translation.en: I thought that we were moving in today.
translation.ja: 今日から住めるのでは？

translation.en: No, no, I didn't say today. I say two-day.
translation.ja: いいえ ２日後と言ったわ

translation.en: -No, but we need to be in today. -No.
translation.ja: 今日の予定で来た ダメ

translation.en: Can we please find another place?
translation.ja: ネス 別の場所は？

translation.en: Not that wouldn't blow our budget.
translation.ja: 予算が厳しい

translation.en: Okay, is there any way that we can move in, maybe later this afternoon or maybe tonight?
translation.ja: せめて夕方か今夜のうちに入居させてくれないか？

translation.en: Because we don't have anywhere else to go.
translation.ja: 行く当てがないんだ

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: ダメ

translation.en: I feel like you didn't even think about that. You just said "no," real quick.
translation.ja: 検討せずに“ダメ”と言ってないか？

translation.en: -No. -That was the same speed.
translation.ja: ダメ ほらまた

translation.en: No. Two days.
translation.ja: ダメ　２日後よ

translation.en: Come on, mami?
translation.ja: お願いだ

translation.en: -Two days. -Two days.
translation.ja: ２日後ね

translation.en: Guys, it's really not that big of a deal. We can get a motel until the place is ready.
translation.ja: 問題ないモーテルにでも泊まろう

translation.en: I mean, that's one option, but also it's kind of not.
translation.ja: その選択肢は使えない

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: We're already spending way more than I thought on furniture,
translation.ja: 家具の追加料金と⸺

translation.en: and other than the money I set aside for studio time, we don't have extra.
translation.ja: スタジオ代を払ったらお金の余裕がない

translation.en: We start spending, we start losing. A motel means we lose, I don't know, a bed.
translation.ja: モーテルに泊まればベッドを失うことになる

translation.en: Or spoons.
translation.ja: スプーンも

translation.en: What about Sebastian? I bet his place is sick, he's got that botched Brazilian booty bread.
translation.ja: セバスチャンの所に泊めてもらうのは？

translation.en: Dude, there's no way that I'm calling Sebby. That's admitting defeat before we even start.
translation.ja: 嫌だね負けを認めるようなもんだ

translation.en: Él es tu primo. He wants to help. He even offered you a job.
translation.ja: いとこでしょきっと助けてくれる

translation.en: If I call him, he's gonna call my dad, and start talking shit,
translation.ja: あいつは俺の親父に告げ口する

translation.en: then my dad will call my tías and tíos
translation.ja: そしたら親父に定職に就けと説教されちまう

translation.en: and say that I should've fucking taken an office job just like them.
translation.ja: そしたら親父に定職に就けと説教されちまう だから連絡も取りたくない

translation.en: I don't want Sebby to know that I'm here.
translation.ja: だから連絡も取りたくない

translation.en: So, what are we gonna do? I vote that we go back home.
translation.ja: じゃあ 故郷に帰ろうか？

translation.en: No. [sighs]
translation.ja: いいや

translation.en: If we start driving back, we can make it back in a couple of hours, beat traffic.
translation.ja: 今なら渋滞を避けて数時間で帰れる

translation.en: [Santi] Big meeting tomorrow. Get some sleep.
translation.ja: 明日のために少しは寝ろ

translation.en: Everybody good?
translation.ja: 寝心地は？

translation.en: [Ness] Yes, perfect. I love this.
translation.ja: もう最高　文句なし

translation.en: Ness, you're tall. Wouldn't you rather be somewhere spacious, like the trunk, or the undercarriage?
translation.ja: ネス 君は背が高いからトランクで足を伸ばしたら？

translation.en: Ow, what the fuck?
translation.ja: 何するんだよ

translation.en: Santi, were you trying to fuck the landlady earlier?
translation.ja: サンティ 大家を誘惑した？

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.ja: マジかよ

translation.en: -[Felix] Come on, park. -[Ness] We gotta move, we're running late.
translation.ja: 早く駐車して 急いで 時間がない

translation.en: [Felix] All right, hurry up.
translation.ja: こっちだ

translation.en: Do you really need your fucking backpack?
translation.ja: バッグは要らないだろ

translation.en: Guys, we only have ten minutes.
translation.ja: あと10分しかない

translation.en: Ness, I can help you with your makeup. We're all looking a little tired from last night.
translation.ja: ネス 顔が疲れてるなメイクを手伝おうか？

translation.en: I did my makeup already.
translation.ja: もう済んでる

translation.en: -Oh, I'm sure it's fine then. -I could kill you.
translation.ja: そうか　ならいい 殺すよ

translation.en: So, look, when Mia asks us to sign this record deal,
translation.ja: ミアがレーベル契約を打診してきたら

translation.en: do I say yes right away?
translation.ja: 飛びつくべきか？

translation.en: Or do I pretend like I'm thinking about it, and then be like,
translation.ja: それとも悩んだフリをしてから⸺

translation.en: -"Yeah, we'll sign." -[Ness] Okay, no.
translation.ja: “イエス”と？ 先走りしないで

translation.en: She's not offering us a record deal. She might not even help us.
translation.ja: まだ契約は提示されてないから⸺

translation.en: We have to prepare for everything.
translation.ja: あらゆる想定が必要よ

translation.en: The only thing I'm preparing for is filling our oceanfront balcony with hoes.
translation.ja: 僕が想定してるのは娼婦(しょうふ)と楽しむことだけ

translation.en: Sorry, shouldn't have said that. I'm trying new things. It's Miami.
translation.ja: ごめん　マイアミで新しい自分になりたい

translation.en: Don't expect her to offer us anything.
translation.ja: 契約の話が出たらラッキーだけど

translation.en: If she did, that would be great. But we have a plan.
translation.ja: 契約の話が出たらラッキーだけど 私たちには計画がある

translation.en: So remember the plan. We have this meeting,
translation.ja: 私たちには計画がある 今回の面談を足掛かりに業界でパイプを作り

translation.en: we parlay that into other meetings, then we network with DJ and industry types,
translation.ja: 今回の面談を足掛かりに業界でパイプを作り

translation.en: spend a little money to promote on some playlists once we figure out who's who,
translation.ja: 人脈ができたら宣伝に少しお金を使う

translation.en: build the hype, you record new music,
translation.ja: そして新曲をレコーディングし

translation.en: and then we start a bidding war between the record labels.
translation.ja: そして新曲をレコーディングし レコード会社に入札合戦させるの

translation.en: Trust the plan.
translation.ja: レコード会社に入札合戦させるの

translation.en: So, trust the plan that has us preparing for the meeting of our lives in a gas station bathroom?
translation.ja: トイレで準備するような計画を信じろと？

translation.en: That is what I am here for. Music, plans.
translation.ja: 私は参謀の役目を果たしてる

translation.en: It's not coming to mind
translation.ja: あなたの役目は何？

translation.en: -what you're here for. -I'm the creative director.
translation.ja: あなたの役目は何？ 僕はディレクター

translation.en: -The fuck? -[Ness] I don't really--
translation.ja: 僕はディレクター 一体何を…

translation.en: Stop it. We trust the plan, okay?
translation.ja: やめろ　計画を信じよう

translation.en: -That's why you're the captain. -Ya tú sabe.
translation.ja: 頼むぞ

translation.en: [in English] No.
translation.ja: 何なの？

translation.en: Is this sensor or is it a switch?
translation.ja: センサーかな？

translation.en: -Wait, wee bit higher. Up there. -No, hit it!
translation.ja: あの上の所にある 押せ

translation.en: Don't hit it! Don't hit it!
translation.ja: 強く押しちゃダメよ

translation.en: Santi?
translation.ja: サンティね

translation.en: Ah, it's so good to finally meet you.
translation.ja: 会えて うれしいわ

translation.en: -It's a pleasure. -[Mia laughs]
translation.ja: 俺もうれしいよ

translation.en: -And you must be Ness. -Yes.
translation.ja: あなたがネス？

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -You, too.
translation.ja: フィリックスあのＭＶの監督ね

translation.en: You must be Felix. I love how you directed the video.
translation.ja: フィリックスあのＭＶの監督ね 会えて光栄だよ

translation.en: -It's a pleasure to finally connect. -Okay.
translation.ja: 会えて光栄だよ どうも

translation.en: We can't believe that we're meeting with someone from the biggest -reggaeton label in the game. -Please.
translation.ja: レゲトン界最大のレーベルの人と会えるなんて

translation.en: Okay. -Come on, let's go find our table. -[Santi] Okay.
translation.ja: 座って話しましょ

translation.en: [softly] Calm down.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて

translation.en: Okay, man, look, I just gotta say, I am impressed with how you do it all.
translation.ja: あなたは自分で作曲してプロデュースして歌ってる

translation.en: I mean, you… You write, you produce, you perform.
translation.ja: 私は そこに感心してるの

translation.en: You know how rare that is in this space? You have a real ear for it.
translation.ja: 今のこの業界ではまれな才能がある

translation.en: Oh, and the video? Loved how y'all did the video.
translation.ja: それに あの曲のＭＶも最高だったし…

translation.en: -It was just-- -Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Of course.
translation.ja: 本当だもの

translation.en: Six million views is no joke.
translation.ja: 600万回再生よ

translation.en: I just love when people just go out there and figure shit out.
translation.ja: 私は探求心のある人を支援したい

translation.en: That's what you're supposed to do. So, now, I have to ask, where do you see yourself going from here?
translation.ja: それで聞きたいんだけどどんな道を歩むつもり？

translation.en: I mean, well, this might sound kind of crazy to you, but I feel like
translation.ja: 大きすぎる夢だが レゲトン界でトップスターになりたい

translation.en: I can be the biggest reggaeton star in the world.
translation.ja: レゲトン界でトップスターになりたい

translation.en: Yeah, that doesn't sound crazy at all.
translation.ja: 実現できる夢だわ

translation.en: If you could call my parents and tell them, that would be great.
translation.ja: 俺の両親にもそう伝えてほしい

translation.en: Yeah, I'll do it after I call mine.
translation.ja: ええ 後でね

translation.en: I'll do it right after I call mine.
translation.ja: 僕も両親に連絡する

translation.en: You wanna be the biggest reggaeton star in the world. Me encanta, obviamente. What's the next move?
translation.ja: それで どうやってトップスターになるつもり？

translation.en: Please tell me it's not that you moved here, take a few meetings with some labels
translation.ja: まさか複数のレーベルと面談して⸺

translation.en: and were hoping they'd climb over each other to… [laughing] …sign you.
translation.ja: 入札合戦させるなんて冗談は やめてよ

translation.en: -No. -No.
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: Okay, good.
translation.ja: ならいい

translation.en: Of course not, no, um…
translation.ja: そんなバカげた計画じゃなくて⸺

translation.en: We have a really well-thought-out plan, and it's, uh, like, multifaceted.
translation.ja: そんなバカげた計画じゃなくて⸺ 綿密に練った計画がある

translation.en: -[Santi] Mmm. -Um… I could explain it to you. It's just like--
translation.ja: 説明してもいいんだけど…

translation.en: -Eh, I got you. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 言わなくてもいいわ

translation.en: It sounds intricate. I love that,
translation.ja: 言わなくてもいいわ ビジョンがあるのはいいことよ

translation.en: because not everybody has it figured out.
translation.ja: ビジョンがあるのはいいことよ

translation.en: See that guy there? The waiter?
translation.ja: あそこに店員がいるでしょ

translation.en: He's a musician, too. He's really good. We had a meeting here a couple months ago at this exact same table.
translation.ja: 彼もミュージシャンで２ヵ月前ここで面談したの

translation.en: But it didn't work out the way he wanted it to. So now, he's here bringing people sandwiches.
translation.ja: でも望みはかなわず今はここで働いてる

translation.en: So you specifically picked this restaurant just to, like, point out that guy's failures?
translation.ja: 彼の話をするためにこの店を選んだの？

translation.en: No. What I'm trying to tell you is, that's every restaurant here.
translation.ja: どこの店にも夢破れた人はいるわ

translation.en: That's the point.
translation.ja: 分かる？

translation.en: I can't say this without sounding just a little bit slimy,
translation.ja: 脅かすわけじゃないけど率直に言って⸺

translation.en: but the music industry is tough.
translation.ja: この世界は厳しい

translation.en: There's so many things new artists don't even know they don't even know.
translation.ja: まだ何も知らないでしょ

translation.en: Market reports, securing guest features and producers,
translation.ja: 市場調査やプロデューサーの確保

translation.en: media promotions, tour scheduling. It's…
translation.ja: プロモーションにツアーの管理…

translation.en: I say that to say we have people to do all that shit for you. All you worry about is make some good music.
translation.ja: そういう仕事を会社に頼めば音楽に集中できる

translation.en: Great, that's what I do.
translation.ja: そりゃ最高だね

translation.en: Plus, there's upfront money, too.
translation.ja: もちろん前払いでお金ももらえる

translation.en: Yeah, there are a lot of uncertainties with being an independent artist.
translation.ja: インディーズのアーティストは不安定だけど

translation.en: But with being an independent artist, what you do know, uh,
translation.ja: インディーズのアーティストは不安定だけど 当てにならない話に乗らないほうがいい

translation.en: is nothing happens without your say-so.
translation.ja: 当てにならない話に乗らないほうがいい

translation.en: [chuckles] And I mean, yeah, that is a hell of a lot more work, but I don't see that as a bad thing.
translation.ja: つまり 自分で多くの仕事をこなす必要があるのは

translation.en: Why would working harder be a bad thing, you know?
translation.ja: 悪いことじゃないのよ

translation.en: Also, that is nothing to say of how whatever money you make goes directly to you.
translation.ja: 稼ぎを中抜きもされないし

translation.en: Can't argue with that.
translation.ja: そのとおり

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.ja: マズい

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Um, I actually have to go.
translation.ja: 悪いけど もう行かないと

translation.en: -Wait. [laughs] -[Mia] Shit. You're leaving? Right now?
translation.ja: 行くって俺たちの面談は終わり？

translation.en: [Mia] Yeah, I'm sorry. My, uh, label is throwing this huge beach club event tonight
translation.ja: 今夜 レーベルのパーティーがあるから⸺

translation.en: and I have to call all the artists.
translation.ja: 出席者に連絡を入れないと

translation.en: Sounds fun.
translation.ja: 楽しそうだ

translation.en: Yes, it will be. Thank you guys so much for lunch. This was great.
translation.ja: ええ　ランチをごちそうさま

translation.en: Yes, hi. Uh-huh.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: You cannot bring him.
translation.ja: 彼はダメよ

translation.en: She didn't offer us a deal. Didn't invite us to the party. Didn't even offer to pay for lunch.
translation.ja: 契約どころかランチ代も出なかった

translation.en: Don't do that.
translation.ja: 黙ってて

translation.en: All I'm saying is it feels a lot like Mia showed up feeling one way about us
translation.ja: ミアは僕らに好印象を抱いていたのに

translation.en: and then you started spraying your Ness mist everywhere, then she left feeling a different way.
translation.ja: ネスが計画を語ったら彼女の態度が急変した

translation.en: Who tells someone about a party, but doesn't invite them to it?
translation.ja: パーティーの話なら普通 招待する

translation.en: Someone trying to send us a message.
translation.ja: あれはメッセージだな

translation.en: Someone covered
translation.ja: ネスのせいで…

translation.en: -in Ness mist. -Stop saying that.
translation.ja: 悪口は やめて

translation.en: -It's gross. -For real, what was going on back there? You started to go off script.
translation.ja: だが実際 君の想定とは違う展開になってる

translation.en: I'm the manager, right? I have to make sure that we make smart decisions.
translation.ja: マネジャーとして最善の道を模索したの

translation.en: It didn't all the way feel like that. It felt like there was some subtext that Mia for sure noticed.
translation.ja: 野望をちらつかせてミアを警戒させたようだった

translation.en: So you thought we had a good plan before, but now you don't?
translation.ja: 私の計画に納得してたくせに

translation.en: Diablo, it took one lunch meeting for you to trust somebody more than us.
translation.ja: 初めて面談した人を信じるわけ？

translation.en: I did not mean it like that. I'm just saying that
translation.ja: 俺が言いたいのは ミアは俺たちの計画が気に食わなかったってことさ

translation.en: Mia, she started to say that our whole plan out here is shitty.
translation.ja: ミアは俺たちの計画が気に食わなかったってことさ

translation.en: -That didn't set off bells in your head? -That's literally
translation.ja: 君も察しただろ？ あれは交渉術よ優位に立つためのね

translation.en: what they do, it's a power game. She wants us to think we need her.
translation.ja: あれは交渉術よ優位に立つためのね

translation.en: If I wasn't in this group, I would think it's hilarious how fucked we are. It took us one lunch meeting
translation.ja: たった一度の面談で数百万ドルの契約を失うとは

translation.en: for Ness to lose us our multimillion dollar record deal.
translation.ja: 本当に お笑いぐさだよ

translation.en: There was no deal!
translation.ja: 契約はなかった

translation.en: There was a deal. And you fucked it!
translation.ja: あったのに君が台なしに

translation.en: You know what? Fuck it. We gotta go to this party.
translation.ja: ミアが言ってたパーティーへ

translation.en: -The one Mia didn't invite us to? -[Ness] Yeah.
translation.ja: 招待されてないのに？

translation.en: We show her we're not some fucking loser wannabes.
translation.ja: ミアに私たちの実力を見せる

translation.en: Ness, the three of us currently live in a 2009 Toyota Corolla.
translation.ja: この2009年式の日本車で？

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. I'm gonna find that party and go there, and I'm going to get "Exagerao" played there.
translation.ja: ええ パーティーで「エクサへラオ」を披露する

translation.en: It won't be listed online. It's an industry event, not a college job fair.
translation.ja: 業界のパーティーは開催場所が分からない

translation.en: -Found it. -Oh.
translation.ja: 見つけた そうか

translation.en: How did you find that?
translation.ja: どうやって？

translation.en: Went to the label's site, found an employee registry, went to Instagram, looked for pictures, names.
translation.ja: レーベルのサイトで社員のリストを確認して⸺

translation.en: Then I checked if anyone had posted it, 'cause everybody posts everything.
translation.ja: 彼らのＳＮＳで一致する場所を探った

translation.en: Wait.
translation.ja: 待った

translation.en: Doesn't make sense. It'll feel weird to show up there uninvited, like--
translation.ja: 招待されてないのに顔を出してもダメだ

translation.en: No, it's a straight-up bad idea. At best, Mia is on the fence about a deal.
translation.ja: ミアにストーカーだと思われたら⸺

translation.en: If we show up to a party we're not even supposed to know about, she'll think we're stalking her.
translation.ja: せっかくの契約のチャンスを潰すことになる

translation.en: -It'll ruin our chance. -No. We should go.
translation.ja: せっかくの契約のチャンスを潰すことになる 行くべきよ

translation.en: Picture it. We are at the beach. Industry big shots -are listening to your song-- -Yes.
translation.ja: 業界の大物たちの前で曲を披露すれば…

translation.en: Yes, easy for you to say 'cause it's not your song. What if it doesn't go well? Then I'm a joke.
translation.ja: 俺が みんなから冷たい目で見られたら？

translation.en: But you won't be. Because you are gonna show them what I've known since I was 12 years old.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　私は12歳の時からあなたの実力を知ってる

translation.en: And that is that you are a star.
translation.ja: あなたはスターよ

translation.en: This is the moment that we moved to Miami for.
translation.ja: だからマイアミに来た

translation.en: We're supposed to be there.
translation.ja: 行くべきだわ

translation.en: Going to this party?
translation.ja: パーティーに行くのは⸺

translation.en: It's our destiny.
translation.ja: 運命なの

translation.en: -Yeah! -Now you're talking.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: -Time to work your charm. -I got this.
translation.ja: サンティ 頼むわよ

translation.en: You got this. You're a big, strong man.
translation.ja: 魅力を発揮してくれ

translation.en: Listen, you probably get this every night, but it's just like,
translation.ja: 毎晩 俺みたいなヤツが来ると思うが⸺

translation.en: literally just me and my beautiful friends--
translation.ja: 毎晩 俺みたいなヤツが来ると思うが⸺ 友達２人と…

translation.en: Santi? Love your video, man.
translation.ja: サンティか　ＭＶを見た

translation.en: [in English] Come right in.
translation.ja: 入っていい

translation.en: Wait. Stop right there.
translation.ja: 待て　ダメだ

translation.en: We just gotta not be too conspicuous and blend in.
translation.ja: 目立ちすぎないようにね

translation.en: Holy fuck. Is that Jon Z?
translation.ja: 見ろ　ジョン･Ｚか？

translation.en: [Ness] Oh, shit.
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: And is that Brray?
translation.ja: あれはブライ？

translation.en: Nah. Everyone is at this party. I gotta go talk to them, Ness.
translation.ja: 大物だらけだ彼らと話さないと

translation.en: What? No, that's the opposite of what I said.
translation.ja: 目立つなと言ったでしょ

translation.en: -It's my destiny! -No. [sputters]
translation.ja: これは運命さ ダメだって

translation.en: I don't think he knows what conspicuous means.
translation.ja: “目立つ”を理解してない

translation.en: Santi?
translation.ja: サンティ？

translation.en: Mia.
translation.ja: ミア

translation.en: -How did you-- -What's up? We figured it out.
translation.ja: どうやって… 見つけたんだ

translation.en: -You did. -You said earlier
translation.ja: ここを？ 探求心のある人を支援すると言っただろ

translation.en: you're most interested in people who figure things out.
translation.ja: 探求心のある人を支援すると言っただろ

translation.en: So Ness, she figured some stuff out and here we are.
translation.ja: ネスが場所を突き止めた

translation.en: -Here you are. -[Ness] Here we are.
translation.ja: そうなの

translation.en: What's new with you?
translation.ja: 調子はどう？

translation.en: -Nothing since today. -Good.
translation.ja: さっきと同じ よかった

translation.en: I wanna introduce to you the next big thing in reggaeton.
translation.ja: レゲトン界の次世代スターを紹介しよう

translation.en: My friend, mi hermano, con ustedes, Javier Luna!
translation.ja: レゲトン界の次世代スターを紹介しよう 俺の友人でもあるハビエル･ルナだ

translation.en: We signed Javier Luna couple of months ago. He's great, right?
translation.ja: 数ヵ月前に彼と契約したの最高の歌手よね

translation.en: I never heard of him.
translation.ja: 初めて聞く

translation.en: You know, that could be you up there.
translation.ja: 次は あなたかも

translation.en: All right, guys, have fun. I'm gonna go out and mingle.
translation.ja: 楽しんでね私は出席者にあいさつを

translation.en: You guys are really here.
translation.ja: まさか来るとは

translation.en: What kind of look was that? Was that like, "I respect your hustle" look
translation.ja: ミアは俺たちの行動力を評価したかな？

translation.en: or was that, "you super overstepped" look?
translation.ja: その反対か？

translation.en: That was good. That was a good look.
translation.ja: いい反応だったわ

translation.en: No, it was bad.
translation.ja: いや 悪かった

translation.en: I'm gonna get a drink.
translation.ja: 飲み物を

translation.en: Yo.
translation.ja: ネス

translation.en: I need to know something. You started pushing being independent at the meeting,
translation.ja: 君はインディーズを推したがこのパーティーを見ると⸺

translation.en: sort of out of nowhere, and honestly, I look around at this party
translation.ja: 君はインディーズを推したがこのパーティーを見ると⸺ メジャーと契約するのも悪くない

translation.en: and it doesn't seem that terrible.
translation.ja: メジャーと契約するのも悪くない

translation.en: Signing a deal with Mia, if it's a good one, is the best thing.
translation.ja: いい契約なら結ぶのが最善の道ね

translation.en: -Right. -And I hope that
translation.ja: ああ ミアがいい契約を提示してくれればいいけど…

translation.en: she does offer it. And I hope that we didn't actually fuck it up today. I just… [laughs]
translation.ja: ミアがいい契約を提示してくれればいいけど…

translation.en: You clearly vibed with her. Right? And professionally, she is the better version of what I'm supposed to be,
translation.ja: 私よりミアのほうがマネジャーとして優秀だよね

translation.en: and I don't know, I bet everything on this too, and I just kept seeing this thing in my head of me getting pushed out.
translation.ja: 私は全力を尽くしてきたけど追い出される時が来そう

translation.en: Of course, I think she's cool and she knows her shit,
translation.ja: ミアが優秀で業界に通じてても

translation.en: but, like, you're like my fucking sister, bro.
translation.ja: 君のことは家族だと思ってる

translation.en: I'm still at home working for my parents if it's not for you. You see things that I don't,
translation.ja: 君がいなければ俺は両親の仕事を手伝ってた

translation.en: in people, in situations, in myself.
translation.ja: 君は俺にない視点を持ってる

translation.en: So, I mean, what are you seeing right now?
translation.ja: 今は何が見えてる？

translation.en: Dímelo, ¿qué tú quieres hacer? You wanna go?
translation.ja: どうしたいんだ？

translation.en: What are you feeling?
translation.ja: 教えてくれ

translation.en: I guess I'm feeling like, I mean, it is a party, and we are in Miami.
translation.ja: せっかくのパーティーだし楽しみましょ

translation.en: And there are a lot of cuties here we can talk to.
translation.ja: 可愛い子も いっぱいいる

translation.en: Throw on your Ness swag and go bag yourself a cutie, okay?
translation.ja: 君の魅力を見せて可愛い子をゲットしろ

translation.en: -You want me to wingman you? -No, I do not.
translation.ja: 付き添おうか？ 結構よ

translation.en: Uh, Mr. Z y Mr. Brray.
translation.ja: ミスター･Ｚにミスター･ブライ…

translation.en: I mean, I don't even know what to call you.
translation.ja: 一体 何と呼べばいいか

translation.en: Papi, just call me Bambi, Bambini,
translation.ja: “バンビ”か“バンビーニ”“バンブリオ”

translation.en: Bamburrio, Bamvicio, el alma de la fiesta, or Brray, bro.
translation.ja: “バンビ”か“バンビーニ”“バンブリオ” あるいは“ブライ”と

translation.en: A'ight, I'mma just stick with Brray. [laughs]
translation.ja: よろしく ブライ

translation.en: Yo, listen, I just wanna say that, like,
translation.ja: 俺は あなたたちの大ファンだし

translation.en: I'm a huge fan of your work
translation.ja: 俺は あなたたちの大ファンだし ２人とも最高のアーティストだよ

translation.en: and I think that you guys are just incredible, man.
translation.ja: ２人とも最高のアーティストだよ

translation.en: Where do I know you from, bro?
translation.ja: 君は誰だったかな？

translation.en: I'm a reggaeton artist. My name is Santi.
translation.ja: レゲトンシンガーのサンティだ

translation.en: -"Exagerao." -That's a banger, bro.
translation.ja: 「エクサへラオ」だ いい曲だ　才能があるな

translation.en: -You got real talent. -Thank you, bro. You, too.
translation.ja: いい曲だ　才能があるな どうも　あなたもね

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ？

translation.en: [all] It's destiny!
translation.ja: これは運命だ！

translation.en: Yo! It's his song! It's his song!
translation.ja: みんな　これは彼の曲よ

translation.en: We're getting a record deal, baby!
translation.ja: 契約を結ぶんだ

translation.en: What's up?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: It was a good look, guys.
translation.ja: 気に入られてた

translation.en: Oscar Morales's office.
translation.ja: モラレスの事務所です

translation.en: No, this is his assistant, Mia.
translation.ja: 助手のミアです

translation.en: Okay, I'll pass that message along. Okay, bye.
translation.ja: 伝えておきます　では失礼

translation.en: [Oscar] Mia, my coffee, please! And where's my dry-cleaning?
translation.ja: ミア　コーヒーはまだか？

translation.en: It just got here.
translation.ja: ただいま
